data.name: Hero Team
data.detailed_description:
In the near future, humanity has decided that war isn't actually much fun, and now nation states resolve their differences in a much more civilized way:
AWESOME REMOTE-CONTROLLED ROBOTS SHOOTING EACH OTHER TO BITS

Each country's Hero Team of elite robot pilots are revered as superstars. Will you join?

Features


  • online multiplayer with dedicated servers
  • couch multiplayer for 1-4 local players (with options to play online together or offline with bots)
  • intuitive controls and gameplay that you can teach your friends in seconds
  • make your own character class just the way you want it with a deep loadout customization system that lets you assign a fixed number of loadout points to customize every parameter of your weapons and game-changing abilities
  • a selection of robot characters to choose from, with purchasable cosmetic options (and absolutely no pay-to-win or loot boxes ever)
  • practice maps that are speedrunnable in solo or co-op modes

What's coming after release?


Regular drops of new maps, modes, characters, weapons, and abilities to keep things minty fresh.

data.short_description: A side-scrolling multiplayer shooter. 1-4 local players can fight 4v4 battles online, or practice with bots offline. Choose your own play style with a deep loadout customization system that lets you change every parameter of your character and add game-changing abilities.

  • OS: Windows 10

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated DirectX 12-compatible GPU

  • Storage: 2 GB available space
